verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man ח֥וּד <WH2330> put forth חִידָ֖ה <WH2420> a riddle וּמְשֹׁ֣ל <WH4911> and speak מָשָׁ֑ל <WH4912> a parable אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <WH559> And say כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD הַנֶּ֤שֶׁר <WH5404> eagle הַגָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> A great גְּד֤וֹל <WH1419> with great הַכְּנָפַ֙יִם֙ <WH3671> wings אֶ֣רֶךְ <WH750> long הָאֵ֔בֶר <WH83> pinions מָלֵא֙ <WH4392> full הַנּוֹצָ֔ה <WH5133> of feathers אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֖וֹ הָֽרִקְמָ֑ה <WH7553> which had divers colours בָּ֚א <WH935> came אֶל־ <WH413> to הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> unto Lebanon וַיִּקַּ֖ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> צַמֶּ֥רֶת <WH6788> the highest branch הָאָֽרֶז׃ <WH730> of the cedar

אֵ֛ת <WH853> רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> the top יְנִֽיקוֹתָ֖יו <WH3242> of his young twigs קָטָ֑ף <WH6998> He cropped off וַיְבִיאֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH935> and carried אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> it into a land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of traffick בְּעִ֥יר <WH5892> it in a city רֹכְלִ֖ים <WH7402> of merchants שָׂמֽוֹ׃ <WH7760> he set

וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> He took מִזֶּ֣רַע <WH2233> also of the seed הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖הוּ <WH5414> and planted בִּשְׂדֵה־ <WH7704> field זָ֑רַע <WH2233> it in a fruitful קָ֚ח <WH3947> he placed עַל־ <WH5921> beside מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> [it] by great צַפְצָפָ֖ה <WH6851> it [as] a willow tree שָׂמֽוֹ׃ <WH7760> [and] set

וַיִּצְמַ֡ח <WH6779> And it grew וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> and became לְגֶ֨פֶן <WH1612> vine סֹרַ֜חַת <WH5628> and became a spreading שִׁפְלַ֣ת <WH8217> of low קוֹמָ֗ה <WH6967> stature לִפְנ֤וֹת <WH6437> turned דָּלִיּוֹתָיו֙ <WH1808> whose branches אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> toward וְשָׁרָשָׁ֖יו <WH8328> toward him and the roots תַּחְתָּ֣יו <WH8478> under יִֽהְי֑וּ <WH1961> remained וַתְּהִ֣י <WH1961> became לְגֶ֔פֶן <WH1612> thereof were under him so it became a vine וַתַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> and brought forth בַּדִּ֔ים <WH905> branches וַתְּשַׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> and shot פֹּארֽוֹת׃ <WH6288> forth sprigs

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become נֶֽשֶׁר־ <WH5404> eagle אֶחָד֙ <WH259> There was also another גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> great גְּד֥וֹל <WH1419> with great כְּנָפַ֖יִם <WH3671> wings וְרַב־ <WH7227> and many נוֹצָ֑ה <WH5133> feathers וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> and behold הַגֶּ֨פֶן <WH1612> and behold this vine הַזֹּ֜את <WH2063> likewise כָּֽפְנָ֧ה <WH3719> did bend שָׁרֳשֶׁ֣יהָ <WH8328> her roots עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> toward וְדָֽלִיּוֹתָיו֙ <WH1808> her branches שִׁלְחָה־ <WH7971> toward him and shot forth לּ֔וֹ לְהַשְׁק֣וֹת <WH8248> toward him that he might water אוֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> מֵעֲרֻג֖וֹת <WH6170> it by the furrows מַטָּעָֽהּ׃ <WH4302> of her plantation

אֶל־ <WH413> beside שָׂ֥דֶה <WH7704> soil טּ֛וֹב <WH2896> in a good אֶל־ <WH413> beside מַ֥יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> by great הִ֣יא <WH1931> it was שְׁתוּלָ֑ה <WH8362> It was planted לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת <WH6213> that it might bring forth עָנָף֙ <WH6057> branches וְלָשֵׂ֣את <WH5375> and that it might bear פֶּ֔רִי <WH6529> fruit לִהְי֖וֹת <WH1961> become לְגֶ֥פֶן <WH1612> vine אַדָּֽרֶת׃ <WH155> that it might be a goodly ס

אֱמֹ֗ר <WH559> Say כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> thou Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD תִּצְלָ֑ח <WH6743> Shall it prosper הֲלוֹא֩ <WH3808> nor אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁרָשֶׁ֨יהָ <WH8328> the roots יְנַתֵּ֜ק <WH5423> ? shall he not pull up וְאֶת־ <WH853> פִּרְיָ֣הּ ׀ <WH6529> the fruit יְקוֹסֵ֣ס <WH7082> thereof and cut off וְיָבֵ֗שׁ <WH3001> thereof that it wither כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner טַרְפֵּ֤י <WH2964> in all the leaves צִמְחָהּ֙ <WH6780> of her spring תִּיבָ֔שׁ <WH3001> ? it shall wither וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor בִזְרֹ֤עַ <WH2220> power גְּדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> even without great וּבְעַם־ <WH5971> people רָ֔ב <WH7227> or many לְמַשְׂא֥וֹת <WH5375> to pluck it up אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> מִשָּׁרָשֶֽׁיהָ׃ <WH8328> by the roots

וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold שְׁתוּלָ֖ה <WH8362> Yea behold [being] planted הֲתִצְלָ֑ח <WH6743> shall it prosper הֲלוֹא֩ <WH3808> not כְגַ֨עַת <WH5060> toucheth בָּ֜הּ ר֤וּחַ <WH7307> wind הַקָּדִים֙ <WH6921> when the east תִּיבַ֣שׁ <WH3001> ? shall it not utterly יָבֹ֔שׁ <WH3001> wither עַל־ <WH5921> on עֲרֻגֹ֥ת <WH6170> in the furrows צִמְחָ֖הּ <WH6780> where it grew תִּיבָֽשׁ׃ <WH3001> it? it shall wither פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

אֱמָר־ <WH559> Say נָא֙ <WH4994> now לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֔רִי <WH4805> now to the rebellious הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יְדַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> Know מָה־ <WH4100> what אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these אֱמֹ֗ר <WH559> ye not what these [things mean]? tell הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold בָ֨א <WH935> is come מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> [them] Behold the king בָּבֶ֤ל <WH894> of Babylon יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> to Jerusalem וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> and hath taken אֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכָּהּ֙ <WH4428> the king וְאֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֶ֔יהָ <WH8269> thereof and the princes וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> thereof and led אוֹתָ֛ם <WH853> אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> them with him to Babylon

וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> And hath taken מִזֶּ֣רַע <WH2233> seed הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <WH4410> of the king's וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <WH3772> and made אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for בְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> a covenant וַיָּבֵ֤א <WH935> with him and hath taken אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> בְּאָלָ֔ה <WH423> an oath וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֵילֵ֥י <WH352> the mighty הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land לָקָֽח׃ <WH3947> of him he hath also taken

לִֽהְיוֹת֙ <WH1961> become מַמְלָכָ֣ה <WH4467> That the kingdom שְׁפָלָ֔ה <WH8217> might be base לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> not הִתְנַשֵּׂ֑א <WH5375> that it might not lift itself up לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> [but] that by keeping אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִית֖וֹ <WH1285> of his covenant לְעָמְדָֽהּ׃ <WH5975> it might stand

וַיִּמְרָד־ <WH4775> But he rebelled בּ֗וֹ לִשְׁלֹ֤חַ <WH7971> against him in sending מַלְאָכָיו֙ <WH4397> his ambassadors מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> into Egypt לָֽתֶת־ <WH5414> that they might give ל֥וֹ סוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> him horses וְעַם־ <WH5971> people רָ֑ב <WH7227> and much הֲיִצְלָ֤ח <WH6743> Shall he prosper הֲיִמָּלֵט֙ <WH4422> ? shall he escape הָעֹשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> that doeth אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> such וְהֵפֵ֥ר <WH6565> such [things]? or shall he break בְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> the covenant וְנִמְלָֽט׃ <WH4422> and be delivered

חַי־ <WH2416> [As] I live אָ֗נִי <WH589> I נְאֻם֮ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3068> GOD אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֗א <WH3808> not בִּמְקוֹם֙ <WH4725> surely in the place הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> [where] the king הַמַּמְלִ֣יךְ <WH4427> [dwelleth] that made him king אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whose בָּזָה֙ <WH959> he despised אֶת־ <WH853> אָ֣לָת֔וֹ <WH423> whose oath וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and whose הֵפֵ֖ר <WH6565> he brake אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִית֑וֹ <WH1285> and whose covenant אִתּ֥וֹ <WH854> in בְתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> [even] with him in the midst בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> he shall die

וְלֹא֩ <WH3808> not בְחַ֨יִל <WH2428> army גָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> with [his] mighty וּבְקָהָ֣ל <WH6951> company רָ֗ב <WH7227> and great יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <WH6213> make אוֹת֤וֹ <WH853> פַרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> Neither shall Pharaoh בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> for him in the war בִּשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <WH8210> by casting up סֹלְלָ֖ה <WH5550> mounts וּבִבְנ֣וֹת <WH1129> and building דָּיֵ֑ק <WH1785> forts לְהַכְרִ֖ית <WH3772> to cut off נְפָשׁ֥וֹת <WH5315> persons רַבּֽוֹת׃ <WH7227> many

וּבָזָ֥ה <WH959> Seeing he despised אָלָ֖ה <WH423> the oath לְהָפֵ֣ר <WH6565> by breaking בְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> the covenant וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> when lo he had given יָד֛וֹ <WH3027> his hand וְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> and hath done לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יִמָּלֵֽט׃ <WH4422> all these [things] he shall not escape ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֮ <WH3069> GOD חַי־ <WH2416> [As] I live אָנִי֒ <WH589> I אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֗א <WH3808> not אָֽלָתִי֙ <WH423> surely mine oath אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בָּזָ֔ה <WH959> that he hath despised וּבְרִיתִ֖י <WH1285> and my covenant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הֵפִ֑יר <WH6331> that he hath broken וּנְתַתִּ֖יו <WH5414> even it will I recompense בְּרֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> upon his own head

וּפָרַשְׂתִּ֤י <WH6566> And I will spread עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> over רִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH7568> my net וְנִתְפַּ֖שׂ <WH8610> upon him and he shall be taken בִּמְצֽוּדָתִ֑י <WH4686> in my snare וַהֲבִיאוֹתִ֣יהוּ <WH935> and I will bring בָבֶ֗לָה <WH894> him to Babylon וְנִשְׁפַּטְתִּ֤י <WH8199> and will plead אִתּוֹ֙ <WH854> for שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there מַעֲל֖וֹ <WH4603> with him there for his trespass אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which מָֽעַל־ <WH4604> that he hath trespassed בִּֽי׃

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> All [מִבְרָחֹו כ] (מִבְרָחָ֤יו <WH4015> fugitive ק) בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲגַפָּיו֙ <WH102> with all his bands בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יִפֹּ֔לוּ <WH5307> shall fall וְהַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <WH7604> and they that remain לְכָל־ <WH3605> to every ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> toward all winds יִפָּרֵ֑שׂוּ <WH6566> shall be scattered וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּ֛י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <WH1696> have spoken ס

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD וְלָקַ֣חְתִּי <WH3947> I will also take אָ֗נִי <WH589> I מִצַּמֶּ֧רֶת <WH6788> of the highest branch הָאֶ֛רֶז <WH730> cedar הָרָמָ֖ה <WH7311> of the high וְנָתָ֑תִּי <WH5414> and will set מֵרֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> from the top יֹֽנְקוֹתָיו֙ <WH3127> of his young twigs רַ֣ךְ <WH7390> a tender one אֶקְטֹ֔ף <WH6998> [it] I will crop off וְשָׁתַ֣לְתִּי <WH8362> and will plant אָ֔נִי <WH589> I עַ֥ל <WH5921> and הַר־ <WH2022> mountain גָּבֹ֖הַ <WH1364> [it] upon an high וְתָלֽוּל׃ <WH8524> and eminent

בְּהַ֨ר <WH2022> In the mountain מְר֤וֹם <WH4791> of the height יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֶשְׁתֳּלֶ֔נּוּ <WH8362> will I plant וְנָשָׂ֤א <WH5375> it and it shall bring forth עָנָף֙ <WH6057> boughs וְעָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> and bear פֶ֔רִי <WH6529> fruit וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> and become לְאֶ֣רֶז <WH730> cedar אַדִּ֑יר <WH117> and be a goodly וְשָׁכְנ֣וּ <WH7931> and under it shall dwell תַחְתָּ֗יו <WH8478> under כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> of every צִפּ֣וֹר <WH6833> all fowl כָּל־ <WH3605> of every כָּנָ֔ף <WH3671> of every wing בְּצֵ֥ל <WH6738> in the shadow דָּלִיּוֹתָ֖יו <WH1808> of the branches תִּשְׁכֹּֽנָּה׃ <WH7931> thereof shall they dwell

וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <WH3045> shall know כָּל־ <WH3605> All עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> And all the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> of the field כִּ֣י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I am יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that I the LORD הִשְׁפַּ֣לְתִּי ׀ <WH8213> have brought down עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> tree גָּבֹ֗הַ <WH1364> the high הִגְבַּ֙הְתִּי֙ <WH1361> have exalted עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> tree שָׁפָ֔ל <WH8217> the low הוֹבַ֙שְׁתִּי֙ <WH3001> have dried עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> tree לָ֔ח <WH3892> up the green וְהִפְרַ֖חְתִּי <WH6524> to flourish עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> tree יָבֵ֑שׁ <WH3002> and have made the dry אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> I the LORD דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <WH1696> have spoken וְעָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <WH6213> and have done פ
